title: Where can I change from skippable to unskippable video ads in the Unity Ads dashboard?

sections.title: Symptoms
content: • I am using Unity Ads in my game and would like to change the ads from skippable to unskippable. Where can I do this in the Unity Ads dashboard?

sections.title: Cause
content: Ads can be edited in the Placement area of the Unity Ads dashboard.

sections.title: Resolution
content: To change the video ads from skippable to unskippable:

sections.title: More Information
content: Please note that skipping video ads is disabled by default for rewarded videos.
